channel.title: love love paradise resue
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "love love paradise resue" - can this permanent item be reused automatically daily?

item.title: Re: love love paradise resue
item.content:encoded: It increases the amount you get when you run missions. It doesn't double them at the end of the day or whatever.

item.title: love love paradise resue
item.content:encoded: so i won a love love paradise at the party house and the next day my friendship point doubled. But since then, it has not been doubling my the friendship with my allies. is it worth it to keep it anymore?
